summary: TAKATA RECALL:  RECEIVED NOTICE OF RECALL BACK IN MARCH 2016 FOR MY 2010 BMW 335I FOR THE DRIVERS AIR BAG.  I LIVE IN TEXAS WHICH IS WHERE I BOUGHT THIS CAR (HAH ZONE).  HOW LONG IS A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME TO WAIT FOR THIS RECALL TO BE REMEDIED?  BMW LETTER STATED THAT WHEN PARTS ARE AVAILABLE I WILL RECEIVE A LETTER.  STILL WAITING.....
